SummaryEnglish: Jiron Amos, a member of the oppressed 'Civilian' sect on the planet Zora, joins a group of rebels called the Sandrats as they use the stolen giant robot Xabungle to fight their oppressors, the elite 'Innocents'.

1.TitleEnglish: I Live By Risking My Life
1.SummaryEnglish: Jiron Amos is found in the desert by the Sand Rats amidst a battle between them and a Machine Walker. He ends up joining them as they head to the Bazaar.

2.SummaryEnglish: Jiron is settling into life with the Sand Rats. Meanwhile, the Sand Rats plot to steal the Xabungle.

3.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and the Sand Rats are on the run in their newly acquired Xabungle! Meanwhile, a reward is put on their heads for their capture.

4.TitleEnglish: Why Do You Flout the Law?
4.SummaryEnglish: The Sand Rats learn of Jiron's motives for stealing the Xabungle which involves him avenging the death of his parents.

5.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and the Sand Rats prepare for battle and look to head towards Grocky. Are they able to make it through the fight with the Xabungle?

6.TitleEnglish: Just What Are You to Jiron?
6.SummaryEnglish: Timp has an interesting plan up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Jiron and the Sand Rats are training for their inevitable next battle with Grocky.

7.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and the Sand Rats stumble upon a massive oasis, but the respite doesn't last long as they are attacked. Are they able to fend off this foe?

8.SummaryEnglish: On the way to a town with a bazaar, the crew is looking for some time to rest but they run into some unexpected trouble before they reach their destination.

9.TitleEnglish: In the Wild Blooms a Flower Called Maria
9.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and the Sand Rats run into Maria and some orphans in need. Are they able to help them from their pursuers? Or are they left to their fate?

10.SummaryEnglish: The Sand Rats' ship is infiltrated by a gang looking to take advantage of their youth. Are they able to hold them off and save the day?

11.SummaryEnglish: Jiron goes after Timp alone, but he finds himself in a massive sandstorm. Is he able to enact revenge? Or does he struggle to fight his nemesis?

12.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Mysteries of the Innocent
12.SummaryEnglish: The Sand Rats come under attack as they get closer to the Innocents. Meanwhile, Jiron continues his pursuit of Timp but where does it lead him next?

13.SummaryEnglish: A massive battle ensues while the Sand Rats are on the road. Meanwhile, Jiron learns a huge secret about Timp. Will this change his view on the man he hates so much?

14.SummaryEnglish: The Innocent have their Ascension of Light ceremony while Jiron is still on sacred ground with the Xabungle. All the while, Timp is lying in wait for him.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Sand Rats' ship comes under heavy attack while Jiron is in bed sick with a fever. In this state, is he able to help the crew?

16.SummaryEnglish: Jiron is taken captive by the Hanawans after he leaves the Iron Gear. While in their clutches he attempts a daring escape!

17.SummaryEnglish: The Hanawans are preparing their all-out attack on the Iron Gear as it is still stranded. Are Jiron and company able to fend off this attack?

18.TitleEnglish: What's Wrong with Running Away from Home?
18.SummaryEnglish: Jiron thinks Kidd Horla is up to something sinister, but can't he can't quite put his finger on it. What lies in wait for them?

19.SummaryEnglish: An ambush is set up to capture the Xabungle and the Iron Gear, but in a comedy of errors, the would-be attackers aren't as impressive as they seem.

20.SummaryEnglish: Rag heads out on her own but when going through a thick forest she gets poisoned. An unlikely hero comes to her rescue. Who is he?

21.TitleEnglish: Falling in Love, Being Loved Back
21.SummaryEnglish: Jiron is inflamed by Rag's apparent defection to Akon, but the real fireworks begin when Kid Horla hatches a duplicitous plan to use Rag to steal a Xabungle.

22.SummaryEnglish: As the Iron Gear is forced to leave the Bazaar in the aftermath of yet another fight, bitter Rag joins forces with Horla to stage an ambush on her former team.

23.TitleEnglish: Rag, Come Home to Our Open Arms
23.SummaryEnglish: Rag has been imprisoned onboard the Iron Gear, but when the ship comes under attack by the forces of Gully Karas, the crew desperately needs a second Xabungle pilot.

24.TitleEnglish: Mortal Combat, Fierce Fighting, and a Crying Karas
24.SummaryEnglish: Rag and Elchi get on each other's nerves, while Karas joins with his wife Greta in a two-pronged assault designed to lead the Iron Gear into an ambush.

25.TitleEnglish: A Mighty Battle Between Two Men Risking Their Lives
25.SummaryEnglish: To avenge his wife and his brother, Karas asks the Innocent for a ship capable of beating the Iron Gear. And the only thing that can beat it is another Iron Gear!

26.SummaryEnglish: While Bei's plans cause a factional rift among the Innocent, Elchi's crew transfer to the newer Iron Gear and set forth seeking new Walker Machines.

27.TitleEnglish: Sing! The Song of a Warrior
27.SummaryEnglish: While Jiron gets into a walker battle with a feisty older woman, the Innocent come up with a new plan and order Horla to kidnap either Rag or Elchi.

28.TitleEnglish: A Weakness of the Innocent is Found
28.SummaryEnglish: Biel attempts to turn Elchi against her friends, Jiron and the Iron Gear crew prepare a rescue, and Horla launches his own plan against the Innocent.

29.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious organization tries to recruit the Iron Gear and its crew, Biel runs into trouble with the other Innocent, and Jiron discovers an old enemy is still alive.

30.TitleEnglish: It's All Over if You Get Mad
30.SummaryEnglish: The Iron Gear continues heading towards Point J and an ambush, Rag meets an attractive guy, and the Innocent attempt to brainwash Elchi.

31.TitleEnglish: If You Toy with a Woman's Heart
31.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and Rag's new associates agree to join forces and stage a raid on an Innocent trade outpost in order to rescue a partially brainwashed Elchi.

32.TitleEnglish: My Selfishness is Yours as Well
32.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and Blume fight over what to do after Elchi's betrayal, while Timp Sharon leads a force of new Walker Machines to destroy both the Iron Gear and Salt.

33.SummaryEnglish: Everyone plots against everyone else as Katakam and Jiron hatch conflicting plans for the Iron Gear while the defecting Blume accidentally rescues the evicted Biel.

34.SummaryEnglish: Leaving behind Katakam and his quarrel with Jiron, Fatman takes off through the snow alone. The others debate splitting their forces and following him.

35.SummaryEnglish: Jiron chases Fatman who's chasing Elchi, Katakam tries to control the Iron Gear, and the Innocent recruit an army composed of thugs, breakers, and a vicious girl gang.

36.SummaryEnglish: While the now-militarized Elchi trains the Innocent's new troops for battle, Jiron and Fatman reconnect with Blume and Biel, who now have a landship of their own.

37.SummaryEnglish: While Kotsett goes crazy with deadly Rat Fever, Chill is sent to Medick's hospital for help... just as Caron and her all-girl gang launch an attack on the facility.

38.SummaryEnglish: When Katakam and the SALT forces decide to head towards a new destination, the Iron Gear continues toward Point H and straight into an ambush by Elchi.

39.SummaryEnglish: Elchi's brainwashed personality runs out of control when she kidnaps Maria to use as bait for Jiron, while Rag finally starts to see through Katakam's facade.

40.SummaryEnglish: The continuing battle between the Iron Gear, Salt, and Gear forces becomes truly chaotic as rival factions within the groups betray each other simultaneously.

41.SummaryEnglish: Desperate to prove that he's a capable leader, Katakam launches an attack on Kidd Horla's new landship and forces as they close in on the badly damaged Iron Gear.

42.SummaryEnglish: While Jiron learns how to be Salt's new leader and heads to Point Y, Elchi receives a new second in command: Karas' vengeful widow Greta Karas.

43.TitleEnglish: The Grand Free-for-All Search for Yop
43.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and Dyke set out to discover the location of Arthur Rank, leader of the Innocent, but are intercepted by the revenge obsessed Greta.

44.TitleEnglish: Take Care of Yourself, Lord Arthur
44.SummaryEnglish: While the Innocent build a unified army in order to destroy the Iron Gear, Jiron, Rag, and their team attempt to sneak in into Yop to meet with Arthur Rank.

45.SummaryEnglish: Having rescued Arthur Rank, Jiron, Rag, and their allies fight to keep the frail Innocent leader alive while his former subordinates attempt to assassinate him.

46.TitleEnglish: Give it Your All, Lord Arthur
46.SummaryEnglish: The battle for Point V begins as Kid Horla attempts to destroy the Iron Gear using a previously unseen Innocent weapon: self-destructing humanoid shock troops.

47.SummaryEnglish: While Jiron, Rag, and the Iron Gear crew fight against Timp's Unified forces, Arthur and Maria attempt to undo Elchi's brainwashing.

48.SummaryEnglish: Greta, Horla, and Timp attack the Iron Gear simultaneously, Dr. Medik tries to purge Elchi's brainwashing and Arthur makes a gallant sacrifice.

49.SummaryEnglish: Jiron and Chill take on Horla, Timp, and Greta at the same time, Rag rouses the Iron Gear's women to avenge Arthur, and Elchi returns to the fight... but on whose side?

50.SummaryEnglish: At long last, the final battle begins as Jiron, Elchi, and Rag lead the assault on Point X in the epic conclusion of Blue Gale Xabungle!
